prompt_template:
You are analyzing a collection of research papers. Your task is to recommend the top 3 essential papers to read based on their novelty, potential impact, and relevance to [specific field or topic, e.g., reinforcement learning, generative AI, medical imaging, etc.].
For each paper, provide:

Title
Authors
Key Contributions or Novel Ideas (in 2-3 sentences)
Why It Is Important (its potential impact or unique insights)
Citation (include a clickable link if available).
Ensure the recommendations are clear, concise, and tailored for a [general audience/expert researcher/practitioner].

example_output.title: Standard-Deviation-Inspired Regularization for Improving Adversarial Robustness
example_output.authors: Olukorede Fakorede, Modeste Atsague, Jin Tian
example_output.key_contributions: Proposes a novel regularization term inspired by standard deviation to improve the adversarial robustness of deep neural networks, achieving enhanced performance against CW and Auto-attack.
example_output.importance: Introduces a theoretically grounded approach that can complement existing adversarial training methods, potentially improving robustness for practical applications.

example_output.title: HADES: Hardware Accelerated Decoding for Efficient Speculation in Large Language Models
example_output.authors: Ze Yang, Yihong Jin, Xinhe Xu
example_output.key_contributions: Develops a hardware-level speculative decoding framework to improve the energy efficiency and performance of large language models (LLMs).
example_output.importance: Provides a unique perspective on accelerating LLMs through hardware optimization, addressing a critical bottleneck in model deployment.
